title: Customer Churn Predictor
techStack: Python, Machine Learning, HTML, CSS, Flask, AWS
desc: A machine learning web application created using python and hosted on AWS elastic beanstalk to predict whether the company's customer will churn or not.

title: Sentiment & Emotion Classification of Tweets
desc: Runs sentiment and emotion classification using Hugging Face's transformers models on about 25k tweets mentioning @Dell. Explores the sentiments and emotions to figure out the positives and negatives of the company's product and services.

title: SQL: Danny's Diner Solved
desc: Demonstrates SQL skills via implementation of basic SELECT, GROUP BY,  and aggregations functions to advance JOINs, CTE, CASE, DENSE_RANK and Windows function.

title: SQL query via Python
desc: Creates a python client object to connect BigQuery public database to query 'hacker_news' dataset using SQL. Performs EDA and visualization.

title: Movie Recommendation System
desc: A movie recommendation system which takes one movie name as user input and recommends 10 movies which the user might like based input.

title: Netflix EDA using R
desc: A basic exploratory data analysis (EDA) of Netflix dataset on a Kaggle notebook.
